CustomField.description: Checked when a Frame and Truss offer has been checked
CustomField.formula: OR( Fascia_and_gutter__c = TRUE, EWP_floor_systems__c = TRUE, Sheet_flooring__c = TRUE, Pre_fab_floor_joists__c = TRUE, Pre_fab_trusses__c = TRUE, Pre_fab_wall_frames__c = TRUE, Stick_frame__c = TRUE, Brick_hardware__c = TRUE, Roof_timber__c = TRUE, Metal_door_frames__c = TRUE, Windows__c = TRUE, Lintels__c = TRUE )
CustomField.label: Frame and Truss
